document_data.mainbody:
erelder Manor was a large mansion located in the Uptown District of Ravens Bluff during the 14 century DR. It was the Tentowers home of the well-liked Liontower noble family.
Nearly as large as the imposing Boldtalon Manor on Waelstar Way, the expansive mansion was guarded by 20 (6.1 m) tall golden lion statues, who sat upon the estates fore-facing stone walls. The manor was fully complemented with its own stables and personal carriage house.
